George Dinwiddie <George.Dinwiddie@...> wrote:

> This brings me to the point that's making it especially difficult
> for me.  Due to circumstances beyond my control, I'm trying to get
> Ant to interface with PVCS.

George, since the release of Ant 1.3 an optional PVCS task has been
committed to CVS, you can find the task and its documentation in CVS -
if you are willing to build Ant from source, you could simply grab the
source file (in src/.../optional) and documentation (from
docs/manual/OptionalTask/).

They should be included in nightly builds as well - leaving you open
to new bugs of course.

Cheers

Stefan
subject: Re: [junit] OT: getting started with Ant
